```
--- 
- name: task inclusion 
  hosts: localhost 
  gather_facts: false 

  tasks: 
  - name: non-included task
    ansible.builtin.debug:
      msg: "I am not included"
  - ansible.builtin.include: more-tasks.yaml
```

```
--- 
- name: included task 1 
  ansible.builtin.debug: 
    msg: "I am the first included task" 

- name: included task 2 
  ansible.builtin.debug: 
    msg: "I am the second included task" 
```

```
ansible-playbook -i mastery-hosts includer.yaml
```

```
  tasks:
  - name: non-included task
    ansible.builtin.debug:
      msg: "I am not included"
  - ansible.builtin.include: more-tasks.yaml
  - name: after-included tasks
    ansible.builtin.debug:
      msg: "I run last"
```

```
---
- name: create leading path
  ansible.builtin.file:
    path: "{{ path }}"
    state: directory
- name: touch the file
  ansible.builtin.file:
    path: "{{ path + '/' + file }}"
    state: touch
```

```
---
- name: touch files
  hosts: localhost
  gather_facts: false
  tasks:
  - ansible.builtin.include: files.yaml
    vars:
      path: /tmp/foo
      file: herp
  - ansible.builtin.include: files.yaml
    vars:
      path: /tmp/foo
      file: derp
```

```
ansible-playbook -i mastery-hosts includer.yaml -v
```

```
--- 
- name: create leading path 
  ansible.builtin.file: 
    path: "{{ item.value.path }}" 
    state: directory 
  loop: "{{ files | dict2items }}" 

- name: touch the file 
  ansible.builtin.file: 
    path: "{{ item.value.path + '/' + item.key }}" 
    state: touch 
  loop: "{{ files | dict2items }}" 
```

```
---
- name: touch files
  hosts: localhost
  gather_facts: false
  tasks:
  - ansible.builtin.include: files.yaml
    vars:
      files:
        herp:
          path: /tmp/foo
        derp:
          path: /tmp/foo
```

```
---
- name: task inclusion
  hosts: localhost
  gather_facts: false
  tasks:
  - ansible.builtin.include: more-tasks.yaml
    when: item | bool
    vars:
      a_list:
        - true
        - false
```

```
---
- name: included task 1
  ansible.builtin.debug:
    msg: "I am the first included task"
  loop: "{{ a_list }}"
- name: include task 2
  ansible.builtin.debug:
    msg: "I am the second included task"
  loop: "{{ a_list }}"
```

```
---
- name: task inclusion
  hosts: localhost
  gather_facts: false
  tasks:
  - ansible.builtin.include: more-tasks.yaml
    vars:
      data: first
    tags: first
  - ansible.builtin.include: more-tasks.yaml
    vars:
      data: second
    tags: second
```

```
---
- name: included task
  ansible.builtin.debug:
    msg: "My data is {{ data }}"
```

```
ansible-playbook -i mastery-hosts includer.yaml -v --tags second
```

```
---
- name: task inclusion
  hosts: localhost
  gather_facts: false
  tasks:
  - ansible.builtin.include: more-tasks.yaml
    loop:
      - one
      - two
```

```
--- 
- name: included task 1 
  ansible.builtin.debug: 
    msg: "I am the first included task with {{ item }}"
- name: included task 2 
  ansible.builtin.debug: 
    msg: "I am the second included task with {{ item }}" 
```

```
---
- name: task inclusion
  hosts: localhost
  gather_facts: false
  tasks:
    - ansible.builtin.include: more-tasks.yaml
      loop:
        - one
        - two
      loop_control:
        loop_var: include_item
```

```
--- 
- name: included task 1 
  ansible.builtin.debug: 
    msg: "I combine {{ item }} and {{ include_item }}" 
  loop: 
    - a 
    - b 
```

```
--- 
- name: touch files 
  hosts: localhost 
  gather_facts: false 

  tasks:
  - name: a task
    ansible.builtin.debug:
      msg: "I am a changing task"
    changed_when: true
    notify: a handler
  handlers:
  - ansible.builtin.include: handlers.yaml
    when: foo | default('true') | bool
```

```
---
- name: a handler
  ansible.builtin.debug:
    msg: "handling a thing"
```

```
ansible-playbook -i mastery-hosts includer.yaml -v -e foo=false
```

```
--- 
- name: vars 
  hosts: localhost 
  gather_facts: false 

  vars_files:
  - variables.yaml
  tasks:
  - name: a task
    ansible.builtin.debug:
      msg: "I am a {{ varname }}" 
```

---
varname: derp 
```

```
--- 
- name: vars 
  hosts: localhost 
  gather_facts: false 

  vars_files:
  - "{{ varfile }}"
  tasks:
  - name: a task
    ansible.builtin.debug:
      msg: "I am a {{ varname }}"
```

```
ansible-playbook -i mastery-hosts includer.yaml -v -e varfile=variables.yaml
```

```
--- 
- name: vars 
  hosts: localhost 
  gather_facts: false 

  tasks: 
    - name: load variables 
      ansible.builtin.include_vars: "{{ varfile }}" 

    - name: a task 
      ansible.builtin.debug: 
        msg: "I am a {{ varname }}" 
```

```
---
- name: vars
  hosts: localhost
  gather_facts: true
  tasks:
  - name: load variables
    ansible.builtin.include_vars: "{{ item }}"
    with_first_found:
      - "{{ ansible_distribution }}.yaml"
      - "{{ ansible_os_family }}.yaml"
      - variables.yaml
  - name: a task
    ansible.builtin.debug:
      msg: "I am a {{ varname }}"
```

```
--- 
- name: vars 
  hosts: localhost 
  gather_facts: false 

  tasks:
  - name: a task
    ansible.builtin.debug:
      msg: "I am a {{ varname }}" 
```

```
ansible-playbook -i mastery-hosts includer.yaml -v -e @variables.yaml
```

```
---
- name: include playbook
  hosts: localhost
  gather_facts: false
  tasks:
  - name: an included playbook task
    ansible.builtin.debug:
      msg: "I am in the included playbook"
```

```
ansible-playbook -i mastery-hosts includeme.yaml
```

```
---
- name: include playbook
  hosts: localhost
  gather_facts: false
  tasks:
  - name: a task
    ansible.builtin.debug:
      msg: "I am in the main playbook"
- name: include a playbook
  ansible.builtin.import_playbook: includeme.yaml
```

```
ansible-playbook -i mastery-hosts includer.yaml
```

|--- vars

--- 
dependencies: 
  - role: common 
    simple_var_a: True 
    simple_var_b: False 
    tags: common_demo 
  - role: apache 
    complex_var: 
      key1: value1 
      key2: value2 
    short_list: 
      - 8080 
      - 8081 
    tags: 
      - apache_demo 
      - 8080 
      - 8181 
```

```
--- 
dependencies: 
  - role: common 
    simple_var_a: True 
    simple_var_b: False 
    tags: common_demo 
  - role: apache 
    complex_var: 
      key1: value1 
      key2: value2 
    short_list: 
      - 8080 
      - 8081 
    tags: 
      - apache_demo 
      - 8080 
      - 8181 
    when: backend_server == 'apache' 
```

    derp: newval

```
--- 
- hosts: localhost 
  gather_facts: false 

  roles: 
  - role: simple 
    derp: newval 
  - role: second_role 
    othervar: value 
  - role: third_role 
  - role: another_role 
```

```
---
- hosts: localhost
  gather_facts: false
  pre_tasks:
  - name: pretask
    ansible.builtin.debug:
      msg: "a pre task"
    changed_when: true
    notify: say hi
  roles:
  - role: simple
    derp: newval
  tasks:
  - name: task
    ansible.builtin.debug:
      msg: "a task"
    changed_when: true
    notify: say hi

  post_tasks:
  - name: posttask
    ansible.builtin.debug:
      msg: "a post task"
    changed_when: true
    notify: say hi
  handlers:
  - name: say hi
    ansible.builtin.debug:
      msg: "hi"
```

```
--- 
- name: print a variable 
  ansible.builtin.debug:     
    var: derp 
  changed_when: true 
  notify: say hi 
```

```
--- 
- src: <name or url> 
  version: <optional version> 
  name: <optional name override> 
  scm: <optional defined source control mechanism, defaults to git>
```
